definition: start explaining and it's a long story (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance

sentences.english: Mine is a long and sad tale.
sentences.chinese: 我的事说来话长，并且令人因感想而悲伤。

sentences.english: It's a long story. Let's just see how Wolpe did that.
sentences.chinese: 说来话长，还是让我们看看沃尔帕是怎么开始的吧。
氪星的大恶棍，说来话长。

sentences.english: "I've a further report to make, " I said, "and a pretty long one.
sentences.chinese: “还有一事禀报，”我说，“这可就说来话长了。

sentences.english: It’s a long story, but put it in a nutshell, he got killed by another bad guy.
sentences.chinese: 说来话长，不过长话短说，他被另一个坏蛋干掉了。

sentences.english: How Ms Maitland gets to that point is a long story;
sentences.chinese: 曼特兰如何走到这里也是说来话长。

sentences.english: It's a long story. The long and the short of it is I'm in love with Annie.
sentences.chinese: 说来话长，整个故事是因为我正和安妮谈恋爱。

sentences.english: How I got here is a long story.
sentences.chinese: 我是怎么来到这里的说来话长。
它保护着我说来话长了。

definition: best not to mention it/drop it/never mind/let's not talk about it
to make a long story short (idiom)
to take one's time making a decision (idiom)/to consider at length
truth to tell/to be quite honest...
to tell in detail
cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development
the whole story
something to be taken up later in speech or writing
long sigh/deep sigh
to set off/to take to the road
to diverge/to branch off the road/to change (the subject)
slight knowledge of sth/to know very little about a subject/a smattering
to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
sin (in Buddhism)/enmity leading to sin
to stop/to halt
to sigh/to heave a sigh
